keyword: how many calories are in a saltine
title: How Many Calories Are in a Saltine Cracker?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a saltine cracker, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and quick variations for your snack tracking.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Saltine Cracker?
assumptions: Standard plain saltine cracker (~5 g), baked, no added toppings or butter.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, and recipe; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One saltine cracker has about 13 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a saltine?
faqs.a: About 13 kcal per standard saltine cracker.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in one saltine?
faqs.a: Approximately 2.1 g carbs, with 0.1 g fiber and 0 g sugars.
Yes, one saltine has ~137 mg sodium due to added salt.

faqs.q: How does brand affect saltine calories?
faqs.a: Slight variations; most are 12-15 kcal per crackerâ€”check labels.
Very low: 0.3 g total fat per cracker, including 0.1 g saturated.
